page.title: 01GENERAL AREA
page.content: {The area in our survey is a rural area {made up mainly of arable farmland.}It is bisected by 2 major roads,the{A1 and the{M62.}The only railway line crossing the grid is used mainly by coal trains carrying coal from local pits to local power stations. There are 3 main built-up areas,these being part of the Warwick Estate and part of Womersley Road in Knottingley and most of Darrington Village west of the A1.Each of these is different from each other,the first being a large, fairly modern council estate,the second mainly pre-war semi-detatched or terrace houses and the third mainly private,stone-built,detatched houses. The 2 industries in our grid are Plasmor concrete block manufacturers and Darrington Quarries,one of a group of local limestone quarries.
